text: Motion
Alright then, let's divide up the roles like this.

We have two and a half hours until showtime,
it's going to be tight...

We've gotta work really fast then!
Choco!

Yeah!
I'll find the perfect costumes!
Motion

As for Rinze and the team...
We need to review the script...

Yes, let's start by writing out the flow
on the whiteboard.
Motion

I'll assist Producer-san...
What should I do?

Ah, maybe we should rearrange the room a bit.
We don't want to get in everyone's way──
Motion

Hehe...
Hahaha──!

Hahaha... hah... hah...
──How was that? Do you think I could play the villain?

! Producer-san, could it be...
You're going to play the villain...?!

Yeah, I thought it would be nice to do something
together, so I want Kaho to train me.

...Understood. Then, please give me
another round of the "villainous laughter"!

Alright...!
──Muahahaha...!
Motion

No, that won't do.
That's the laugh of a hero.
H-Hero?
You need to embody more villainy!
Motion

Imagine... before you stands a righteous hero!
Producer-san wants to defeat that hero...

Uwaa... I want to defeat him...
I want to defeat the hero...
That's right!!
Motion
──You look so serious...

Uwohh!
You've come, Hero!

I am Houkura Red!
I'll liven up this town!

Then I, shall dampen the spirits of this town...!!
Gwahahaha──!
W-What are you doing...?
I came to report that I've secured the costumes──

Ah, Juri-chan!
Show us Demon King Julie, please!

Demon King... You mean from when we played
heroes before...? You're asking all of a sudden...

──Demon King Julie!
I am the righteous warrior, Houkura... Red!
Motion

Kukuku... You've come...
The audacious Houkura Red...!
I see, a cool villain could work too...

You shouldn't imitate.
Producer-san, you need to create your own villain.

Let's think about your background!
Where were you born, and how have you lived?

Hey hey,
We don't have time for that.

No, digging deeper is important.
As long as we have time, I'll try to create my villain.
Well, if you can do it, go ahead...

We should have paper and pen!
Let's all go back to where everyone is...!
Motion
──With this, we've roughly outlined the story.
Speaking of which... what about the villain...?
In that case, it's already decided!
──Producer-san... no...
Motion
Downer!!!
